articles.author: Bryan Alexander, USA TODAY
articles.title: How low can 'AGT: Extreme' go? Fire limbo performer sizzles, critic Simon Cowell feels the burn - USA TODAY
articles.description: The hottest limbo act ever brings once-unimpressed judge Simon Cowell really low down in "America's Got Talent: Extreme." What happened in episode 3:
articles.content:
"America's Got Talent: Extreme" is just starting to cook, three weeks into NBC's four-week competition, after last week's Simon Cowell roasting of trapeze artists risking life and limb.
But Monday's… [+4347 chars]

articles.title: On India's Votes At UN On Ukraine War, Former US Diplomat's Remarks - NDTV
articles.description: India has compulsions with Russia, and in their neighbourhood, issues with China over territory, a former top American diplomat has told US lawmakers.
articles.content:

articles.title: Nintendo Confirms Pokémon Scarlet And Violet Will Be Open World - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: A tweet from Nintendo of America has confirmed that the newest addition to the Pokémon franchise will be open world.
articles.content:
Open world for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet? Confirmed.
The announcement of the newest mainline Pokémon titles has fans screaming, crying, throwing up, and gnawing at their nearest drywall. Easy to … [+2069 chars]
